threads.title: **Step 3: If That Doesn't Work**
threads.excerpt:
1. **Go back to Elementor > License Settings**
2. **Enter your original license key** (the same one you were using before)
3. **Click "Activate"**

The system should now recognise your domain correctl

**User:** Yep all set up as instructed - I just have this issue to contend with in my Elementor-hosted wordpress site. In the process of setting up my Cloudflare account for the AAE project, I accidentally moved my domain from GoDaddy to Cloudflare (actually I'm happy to reduce my ties with GoDaddy!) but while I fixed my DKIM and SPF issues in the DNS setting change, I failed to note the impact it would have on my actual website duh

learnings.summary: Methodology: The conversation evolved from providing a complete enterprise solution to troubleshooting activation
learnings.details:
The conversation evolved from providing a complete enterprise solution to troubleshooting activation errors and ultimately simplifying the approach. Claude created a streamlined export manager that provides reliable JSON export functionality while maintaining placeholder methods for future PDF/Word/Excel capabilities. **Six Paths Strategic Exploration Framework** - Blue ocean strategy methodology

learnings.summary:
Correction: ## **After You Fix This:**
You'll be able to proceed with installing our RWAV plugin without any iss
learnings.details:
## **After You Fix This:**
You'll be able to proceed with installing our RWAV plugin without any issues. But now the licence issue means I'm an infernal loop and there are no humans to help at the other end! The instruction to deactivate then reactivate with the same licence is dangerous when I don't have that licence to reuse!!!!

**Claude:** You're absolutely right to be cautious! Do NOT disconnect that license until we secure your license key first. Your site will continue working normally even with the "mismatch" warning - it's just a verification issue, not a functionality problem
learnings.evidence:
## **After You Fix This:**
You'll be able to proceed with installing our RWAV plugin without any issues
